actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to allow non-Federal public bodies to repay in yearly installments cash payments due the Federal Government in connection with any resource water project undertaken by the Secretary of the Army.

summary.text: Permits non-Federal public bodies to repay in yearly installments cash payments due the Federal Government in connection with any resource water project undertaken by the Secretary of the Army. Sets forth the method for determing interest rates for such payments and the requirements for such an agreement to repay.

titles.title: A bill to allow non-Federal public bodies to repay in yearly installments cash payments due the Federal Government in connection with any resource water project undertaken by the Secretary of the Army.
